Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Bird flew into tree above me while I was recording voice notes. Growls and grunts from one, and then later 2 birds. 2 brief pauses representing about 30 seconds of silence each. Habitat is tropical deciduous woodland.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Patagioenas picazuro,Campylorhynchus turdinus,Crypturellus undulatus,Ortalis canicollis,Furnarius rufus
